archimate:Requirement.name: FR001: Extract Business Info from SOR
archimate:Requirement.documentation: To enable CQRS pattern, extract "significat business events" from SORs to build a side cache used for read oprations. A significat business event is one operation ora a group of coordinated operations (generally "transactions" but also batch) that change the status of a business related entity. The business related entity may depend from the target SOE so the significat business event could be mapped more than one data lake.
